Title: Requires signage on state highways designating where there are zero-emission charging and refueling stations nearby
Summary: Requires signage on state highways designating where there is a zero-emission charging and refueling station that is open and available to the public within three miles of an exit or off-ramp.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to installing zero-emission charging and refueling station signs on New York state highways
